contributionDescription:
We developed Optimism AI Chatbot that will provide up-to-date information, potentially saving each Optimism member or community at least one hour daily. 

Every day, platforms like Discourse and Discord are inundated with new inquiries. Many newcomers hesitate to ask questions, fearing they might appear uninformed. Simultaneously, even long-standing members often struggle to locate specific information. To address these challenges, we developed a chatbot to enhance the user experience for both new and seasoned Optimism members.

Note: This is v1, and we aim to improve the intelligence by at least 100x over next few months.

contributionLinks.description: dodao-ui is the repository which has the code for the chatbot ui

impactDescription:
he chatbot aims to save each member at least one hour every day. Assuming 50 full-time contributors and an average hourly rate of $50, this translates to a monthly productivity gain or cost savings of $75,000/month.

This is v1 to demonstrate feasibility. Future versions will be much more intelligent.
recategorizeReason: NO. The application should be categorized as "PROJECT" because it refers to a collective development effort for Optimism AI Chatbot.
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, User Experience & Adoption, Content Creation, Web3 Community Platform
